nodes.bodyText:
isAddressMapExists is not used in this constructor. is this intentional? A false value would mean an older server version.
If we don't need the value of this var, it's better to remove this constructor.

Yes, it is unused, but AFAICT it can't be avoided, because it is called this way by the generated codec: https://github.com/hazelcast/hazelcast/pull/17003/files#diff-85119ef45bcf87c56a3c4e6485d02c5cR72
I also don't like it though. Do you have any suggestion on how to tweak the code generator?
